statements: SELECT * FROM ProductSKU;
SELECT id, product_name, price FROM ProductSKU WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM ProductSKU WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT * FROM ProductSKU WHERE quantity <= 10;
SELECT id, sku_code, price FROM ProductSKU WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductSKU WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY category ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM ProductSKU WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT sku_code, category, price FROM ProductSKU WHERE category = 'Electronics' OR category = 'Clothing';
SELECT * FROM ProductSKU WHERE quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY price ASC, product_name DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, price, quantity FROM ProductSKU WHERE price < 50 AND category = 'Furniture';
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT sku, product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE sku LIKE 'ABC%'
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 100
SELECT p.product_name, s.sale_date FROM products p JOIN sales s ON p.id = s.product_id WHERE s.quantity_sold > 10 ORDER BY s.sale_date ASC
SELECT sku, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM products GROUP BY sku HAVING avg_price < 50
SELECT * FROM product_sku;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_sku WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_sku ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, variation_name, quantity FROM product_sku WHERE variation_name LIKE '%XL%';
SELECT product_name, category FROM product_details WHERE brand = 'Nike';
SELECT * FROM product_sku;
SELECT product_name, variation_name, price FROM product_sku WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_name, variation_name, price FROM product_sku WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, brand FROM product_details WHERE brand = 'Nike';
SELECT forecast_date, demand_quantity FROM demand_forecasting WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT sku_id, product_name, price FROM product_sku;
SELECT * FROM sku_variation WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT product_name, product_category, price FROM product_sku WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT demand_date, demand_value FROM demand_forecasting ORDER BY demand_date DESC;
SELECT sku_id, available_quantity, store_id FROM product_availability WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM product_sku WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT DISTINCT product_name, product_category FROM product_sku WHERE product_category = 'Electronics'
SELECT sku_id, variation_name, quantity FROM sku_variation WHERE cost <= 50 ORDER BY sku_id, quantity DESC
SELECT p.product_name, a.available_quantity FROM product_sku p INNER JOIN product_availability a ON p.sku_id = a.sku_id WHERE a.store_id = 1
SELECT MAX(demand_value) AS max_demand, MIN(demand_value) AS min_demand FROM demand_forecasting
SELECT * FROM product_sku;
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM product_sku WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT sku_id, product_name FROM product_sku ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT variant_name, option_name, option_value FROM product_variants WHERE sku_id = 1;
SELECT forecast_date, demand_quantity, actual_quantity FROM demand_forecasting WHERE sku_id = 3 AND forecast_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM product_sku ORDER BY product_name DESC, price ASC
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_sku WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT sku_id, product_name, category, price, stock_quantity FROM product_sku WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND stock_quantity > 50
SELECT pv.variant_id, pv.variant_name, ps.product_name, ps.category FROM product_variants pv INNER JOIN product_sku ps ON pv.sku_id = ps.sku_id ORDER BY pv.variant_name ASC

SELECT df.forecast_id, ps.product_name, df.forecast_date, df.demand_quantity, df.actual_quantity FROM demand_forecasting df LEFT JOIN product_sku ps ON df.sku_id = ps.sku_id ORDER BY df.forecast_date ASC
